meanings.definition: One who pours out or emits something in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The outpourer of water filled the bucket quickly.
meanings.sent2: The outpourer of love and kindness touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The outpourer of jokes had everyone laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her words were an outpourer of wisdom, guiding us through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The outpourer of creativity painted vibrant masterpieces.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that releases emotions or thoughts freely and abundantly.
meanings.sent1: As an outpourer of emotions, she couldn't hold back her tears.
meanings.sent2: The poet was known as an outpourer of deep feelings through his verses.
meanings.sent3: The outpourer of ideas never ran out of innovative solutions.
meanings.sent4: His music was an outpourer of passion, resonating with listeners worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The outpourer of stories captivated the audience with each word.
